tooltip: Select Sulkaris, the Fallen Sage as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Sulkaris focuses on improving the durability of Gohma units.
Allows you to summon Sulkaris, a massive creature hero that tears apart enemies with her claws.
Short ranged unit that deals damage through enemy armor and self destructs when slain.
Gohma Princesses and Queens grow barbed spikes that passively damage melee attackers.
Dramatically improves Magic armor, slightly improves non-magic armor, and passively damages melee attackers for Soldier Larva, Pincergohma, and Spinalgohma.
